item.title: Schedule
item.description: The website for the String Pheno Seminar series has moved here.

item.title: Past Talks
item.description: All talk videos can be found here. See below for individual talk information, slides, and video links.. Tuesday, July 6, 2021 11:00, Isabel Garcia Garcia, UC Santa Barbara, KITP Title: Bounce of Nothing Abstract: Theories with compact extra dimensions are sometimes unstable to decay into a bubble of nothing – an instability resulting in the destruction of spacetime. In this talk, I will discuss the existence of these bubbles in theories where the moduli fields that set the size of the extra dimensions are stabilized at a positive vacuum energy – a necessary ingredient of any theory that aspires to describe the real world.
